Title:
Training on Errors Experiment to Detect Fault-Prone
Software Modules by Spam Filter
UseOF-SZZ: To extracted FP modules from source code based
Summary:
a novel approach for detecting fault-prone modules using a spam filtering
technique, named Fault-Prone Filtering.
Outcome:
approach can classify about 85% of software modules correctly. The result also 
    indicates that fault-prone modules can be detected relatively low cost at an early stage.
